html:
Experience Letter

Date: {{ frappe.utils.today() }}


To Whomsoever It May Concern,

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name }} (Employee ID: {{ doc.name }}) was employed with {{ doc.company }} as {{ doc.designation }} from {{ frappe.format_date(doc.date_of_joining) }} to {{ frappe.format_date(doc.relieving_date) if doc.relieving_date else "Present" }}.

During the tenure of service, {{ doc.employee_name }} exhibited professional skills, dedication, and sincerity towards all responsibilities. The management found the performance satisfactory.

We wish {{ doc.employee_name }} all the best for future endeavors.



Sincerely,

Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}
name: Experience Letter
